description: Canonical definitions and retrieval methods for AGI-KERNEL self-assessment, governance, and capability tracking metrics.

metrics.description: The count of external dependencies whose configuration or version is altered during an evolution cycle.
Flag indicating if the evolution change impacts core kernel components or designated security/recovery infrastructure.
Sensitivity classification of data handled by the current component.
The kernel's self-assessed overall system maturity (0.0 to 100.0).
Success rate of robust JSON data extraction from LLM outputs (JSON Parsing capability).
Total number of infrastructure components autonomously created by the kernel (e.g., branches, testing frameworks).
Ratio of successful capability improvements per 10 evolution cycles (Meta-Reasoning effectiveness).
